title: HELP ME PLZ
body: plz someone help me i can't open my  league of legends launcher because if i do then something pops upp about (pvp.net patcher kernel doesn't work anymore.){{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: Hey there, this can be fixed! :D  This error is very common with settings or anti-virus blocking the patcher from launcher.  Run through the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to get that fixed up.
